title: Verify the OO installation on GKE
content:
To verify OO installation in GKE, do the following: 

  1. Log in to the bastion node.

  2. Run the following command to ensure that all OO pods are ready.

    kubectl get pod -n <OO NAMESPACE> |grep -v 1/1|grep -v 2/2|grep -v 3/3|grep -v 4/4|grep -v Completed

    Where:

    <OO NAMESPACE> is the namespace where you deploy the OO chart.

    This command returns a list of abnormal pods. When it returns no results, all OO pods are ready.
